author: arkurth
msg: Changed logic in utils.pm::get_request_info so that the imagemeta.rootaccess value is used for members of a server request admin group. This prevents the non-owner of an image from being able to make a server request and bypass the image owner's root access setting.
Added check to ensure request user is granted root access if request.forimaging = 1 and request user is the image owner.
